page.title: 11Recreation in S'key&C'thrp.
page.content: {Indoor Games:}billiards, pool, snooker, darts, table tennis played in Village Hall. {Outdoor Sports:}Stiffkey Football Club has old history as Saturday Club. In 1960, after 10 years at Cockthorpe, re-acquired old field on special lease under care of Social Services Committee. Now a Sunday Club. Junior team started 1981, not enough minors to continue. Cricket Club reformed 1985, helped by Â£100 from Fete Cmmittee. {Individual sports and activities:} racing in East Anglia on owner-designed raft 'Stewkey Blue'; cross-country running; marathon running from Kelling to Norwich and nationwide. Bird-watching, fishing, pheasant shooting, sailing, swimming, walking draw many tourists.
